name: AE Archer
description:
AE Archer comes to your phone now!

Smooth game play, amazing graphics and awesome vivid sound, AE Archer gives you an epic sports experience just like in the wild.

Any feedback please mail us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!

Pull your bow down. Aim the arrow at the target by moving your hand on the screen. Confirm the target distance and wind. Watch out the moving target. Take off your finger to shot the arrow.

Three addictive modes here: Single Mode, VS Mode and Training Mode.

Challenge yourself with the Single Mode, enjoy the most crazy and thrilling sports feeling. Endless levels as well as incremental difficulties, witch gives you fantastic challenges. 10 point time bonus gives you a good chance to get higher scores. Try your best to hit the further level!

Play VS Mode, competing with your family or friend to get the honorable champion cup！

Not enough archer experience? Train yourself with the Training Mode and improve yourself to be a qualified archer athlete!

If you like Basketball, Football, Soccer, Golf, Air Hockey, Pool, Fruit Shooting, Army Sniper, Bowling, Play Tennis, 3D Badminton, AE 3D Motor or other sports games, you shouldn’t miss this game.

Keep your nerve and aim your target. Let’s begin the fantastic shooting!
